train.from sentence: We train our model using Adadelta with gradient clipping .

our network.from sentence: We regularize our network using dropout with the drop - out rate tuned using development set .

dimensionality.from sentence: We have 3 hidden layers in our network and the dimensionality of the hidden units is 100 .

network.from sentence: All the weights in the network are initialized from small random uniform noise .

hyperparameters.from sentence: We tune our hyperparameters based on ACE05 development set and use them for training on ACE04 dataset .
